data.title: Grand Prix Nova
data.text:
June 24th

@ TEATRELLI

09.45 Jury meeting

10.55 Winterberg’s last journey | Czech Republic | Czech Radio | drama category

12.00 Spores | UK | Afonica | drama category

13.00 Lunch break

16.00 Danger | Switzerland | SSR - RSI | drama category

16.30 Discussion about presented broadcasts and vote

June 25th

@ TEATRELLI

10.00 Five Best Days | Switzerland | SRF Swiss Radio and Television| drama category

11.49 Objects | Croatia | Croatian Radiotelevision | drama category

12.54 Lunch break

15.10 To go down | Belgium | deux temps trois mouvements | drama category

16.10 Manure | Czech Republic | Czech Radio | drama category

16.45 Discussion about presented broadcasts and vote

@ TEATRELLI

June 27th

@ TEATRELLI

10.00 WORKSHOP | EDITA KUDLACOVA (Head of Radio EBU), DAN SANTA (Head of International Relations at the Romanian Radio)

Presentation and dialogue about EBU projects and funding

Q&A session

13.00 Lunch break

June 28th

@ TEATRELLI

11.30 Meeting for bus transfer to Elisabeta Palace in Bucharest

12.00 AWARD CEREMONY @ Elisabeta Palace

13.30 LUNCH offered by the festival for all the participants
